name: Fizik R4B Uomo Cycling Shoes - Unisex
description: A high-performance road shoe that gets trickle-down tech from Fizik's WorldTour-level models. Microfiber upper is durable yet flexible, and perforated for extra breathability. The closure system is easy to control and fast to adjust, it allows you to find a secure fit that's still comfortable. The pinnacle of power transfer and aerodynamics is hit via the sculpted carbon fibre sole.Microfiber upper is supple yet strong, with laser perforations to help it breathe.Adjustable Boa IP 1 closure system and hook and loop straps provide a perfect fit.Removable Fizik insole is comfortable and supportive.Aerodynamic carbon fibre outsole for excellent power transfer.Compatible with three-hole clipless pedal systems.
